<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This appears to be overallocating.  Needs investigation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the number of bytes to allocate from the FrameInfo.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackSize = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a14c39a24bf6ebbe339ae8a453c7fdd11">getStackSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// st %fp,-4&#91;&#42;%sp&#93;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add %sp,8,%fp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, LII.get(Lanai::ADD&#95;I&#95;LO), Lanai::FP)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocate space on the stack if needed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sub %sp,StackSize,%sp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StackSize != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace ADJDYNANALLOC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a0509430713d587eba74220a8375948a8">hasVarSizedObjects</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    replaceAdjDynAllocPseudo(MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiframelowering/#ac87600c837b27b6057feb03a6bc8ef30"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiframelowering/#ac87600c837b27b6057feb03a6bc8ef30">LanaiFrameLowering::eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;MF&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Discard ADJCALLSTACKDOWN, ADJCALLSTACKUP instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.erase(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The function epilogue should not depend on the current stack pointer!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It should use the frame pointer only.  This is mandatory because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of alloca; we also take advantage of it to omit stack adjustments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before returning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that when we go to restore the preserved register values we must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not try to address their slots by using offsets from the stack pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That&#39;s because the stack pointer may have been moved during the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// execution due to a call to alloca().  Rather, we must restore all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preserved registers via offsets from the frame pointer value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note also that when the current frame is being &quot;popped&quot; (by adjusting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the value of the stack pointer) on function exit, we must (for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sake of alloca) set the new value of the stack pointer based upon</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the current value of the frame pointer.  We can&#39;t just add what we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// believe to be the (static) frame size to the stack pointer because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we did that, and alloca() had been called during this function,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we would end up returning &#42;without&#42; having fully deallocated all of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the space grabbed by alloca.  If that happened, and a function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// containing one or more alloca() calls was called over and over again,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the stack would grow without limit!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RET is lowered to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ld -4&#91;%fp&#93;,%pc  # modify %pc (two delay slots)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as the return address is in the stack frame and mov to pc is allowed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// emitEpilogue emits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      mov %fp,%sp     # restore the stack pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ld -8&#91;%fp&#93;,%fp  # restore the caller&#39;s frame pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before RET and the delay slot filler will move RET such that these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions execute in the delay slots of the load to PC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiframelowering/#a188a6b8252a69aa600405ee5308b96ff"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiframelowering/#a188a6b8252a69aa600405ee5308b96ff">LanaiFrameLowering::emitEpilogue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;MF&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.getLastNonDebugInstr();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiinstrinfo">LanaiInstrInfo</a> &amp;LII =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiinstrinfo">LanaiInstrInfo</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiframelowering/#a637e628c38a224cd0c31bdf2880e7ff4">STI</a>.getInstrInfo());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getDebugLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Restore the stack pointer using the callee&#39;s frame pointer value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, LII.get(Lanai::ADD&#95;I&#95;LO), Lanai::SP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Lanai::FP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Restore the frame pointer from the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, LII.get(Lanai::LDW&#95;RI), Lanai::FP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Lanai::FP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(-8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lpac/#ab2e8fd263c886a713ccba7505c1b2ee0a25d8ba0c31384de6b8eaf87262199804">LPAC::ADD</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiframelowering/#af9008c34cdebe84ae9252952470f0599"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiframelowering/#af9008c34cdebe84ae9252952470f0599">LanaiFrameLowering::determineCalleeSaves</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp;SavedRegs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &#42;RS)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a2f26766f4dcfa6457ba405584a34d5c3">TargetFrameLowering::determineCalleeSaves</a>(MF, SavedRegs, RS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a54f334a9c8ca6d105eae383ae87e4524">getFrameInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lanairegisterinfo">LanaiRegisterInfo</a> &#42;LRI =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lanairegisterinfo">LanaiRegisterInfo</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lanaiframelowering/#a637e628c38a224cd0c31bdf2880e7ff4">STI</a>.getRegisterInfo());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = -4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reserve 4 bytes for the saved RCA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a03cf34252938b54f7e86c736f9fd7dc1">CreateFixedObject</a>(4, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> -= 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reserve 4 bytes for the saved FP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a03cf34252938b54f7e86c736f9fd7dc1">CreateFixedObject</a>(4, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
